level.text: Contracts or pending procurements related to the Hospital may be transferred by the Hospital to any agency or instrumentality of the District in accordance with the provisions of this section.
The CCO shall review the proposed procurement or contract and determine whether it is in the best interest of the Hospital to transfer the procurement or contract.
If the CCO determines it is in the Hospital’s best interest to transfer a contract or procurement, the Contracting Officer shall have the authority to transfer the contract.

Transfer of a contract or procurement shall not operate to transfer funds to support the assigned contract or procurement. Funds shall be transferred pursuant to an intra-District memorandum of understanding, reprogramming, or other appropriate process.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8507 (October 8, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3086 (April 18, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4565, 4595 (May 27, 2011).
